mapper.update: update room set readCount=readCount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select tname from tag where roomNum=#{num}
select rimageUrl from roomImage where roomNum=#{num}
select icontent from information where roomNum=#{num}
select pcontent from precaution where roomNum=#{num}
select cname from room r inner join roomCategory rc on r.num = rc.roomNum inner join category c on rc.categoryNum = c.num where r.num = #{num}
select fname, imageUrl from room r inner join roomFacility rf on r.num = rf.roomNum inner join facility f on rf.facilityNum = f.num where r.num = #{num}
select nickname,question,answer,writeday,answerday,profile_image from QnA q inner join member m on q.userNum = m.idx where q.roomNum = #{num} order by writeday desc
select nickname,profile_image,content,answerContent,rating,writeday,reviewImageUrl from review r inner join member m on r.userNum = m.idx where r.roomNum = #{num} order by writeday desc

select nickname,content,answerContent,rating,writeday,reviewImageUrl,profile_image from review r inner join member m on r.userNum = m.idx where r.roomNum = #{num} and r.reviewImageUrl!='null' order by writeday desc
select group_concat(bookingTime order by cast(bookingTime AS UNSIGNED )asc) bookingTime from bookingDetail where roomNum=#{num} and bookingDate= #{selectDay} and cancelDate is NULL
select companyName from host where num = #{num}
select num,name,address address,headcount,weekAmPrice,payment from room where num != #{num} and (hideStatus=1 and approvalStatus=1) Order by rand() limit 6
